website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo LI2721s Wide is an attractive 27-inch desktop monitor offering solid IPS color quality and wide viewing angles. Its slow pixel response may be an issue for discerning gamers, though.

customer_reviews.title: Best I have had
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional Clarity - Running on DVI connection not analog. They do have a 1/4 inch black band inside of the plastic edge. doesn't bother me at all. The stand is Metal and solid. Color very good to amazing. Others have stated there is color loss at angles to viewing, I see none until about 90 degrees off center. No one should be viewing at that angle. Best monitors I have ever had. I do computer service/repairs, the only better I have seen is Apple and they are not 300.00. A definite BUY.
customer_reviews.author: pjpriest

customer_reviews.title: Great value & performance, webcam fits nicely on top (link &  model attached)!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works well, no issues. Increased from a 19-inch panel, so this is a great upgrade and for a very good price. The stand is cast aluminum or zinc, and is sturdy. It helps set the monitor to the back of the table to stay far enough from your eyes. Logitech HD webcam fits nicely on the top edge of the monitor, and both together produce great video for conferencing, skype, etc. This fits very well:  Logitech C615 Autofocus Portable Webcam.
customer_reviews.author: D. Landers

customer_reviews.title: Nice Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitor, but it does not look quite as elegant in real-life as in the pictures. Some of our big screen TVs have a smaller bezel than this monitor although it's not bad. Decent display quality for an economical monitor. We also use it at trade-shows where the wide viewing angle is appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: Scrren worked Fine
customer_reviews.text: But I ended up returning it and purchasing a second 27" Apple Cinema Display. This one did not match the screen resolution of the Apple so everything was a different size. The sceen looked and worked fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Spazpilot

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: good screen, for cheap price :) BEST style of all the 27inch IPS out there in my opinion, with the most SOLID stand. doesn't wobble. no dead pixel on arrival has multiple inputs for PS3 / console games. as well as HDMI / DVI for pc it is perfect (almost) in every way except: 1080p not 1440p - i bought this knowing that.. i did not need 1440p screen is not fully "edge to edge"..there's a quarter inch border at the edge of the screen. non-rotating stand... i have to turn the whole thing to angle it. not a HDTV??? no antenna input -.-
customer_reviews.author: D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great monitor for the price. Bright Picture, robust colors, good size... it is really worth every penny. I am using it as a second monitor attached to my iMac using a Thunderbolt to HDMI converter - it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Osherow

customer_reviews.title: just like the commercials say
customer_reviews.text: Actually have owned one of these for just under a year, and recently bought another when I purchased a Microsoft Surface Pro 3 and got rid of my laptop, ..., yup, just like the commercials say. In any case, got one hooked up through the docking station, and the second through the Surface itself, great setup, both Monitors work great, zero complaints
customer_reviews.author: Anthony B. Messerli

customer_reviews.title: very nice. tried to go cheap and use my 6-yr ...
customer_reviews.text: very nice. tried to go cheap and use my 6-yr old Dell monitor with my new Lenovo desktop, but eventually broke down and ordered this. Setup was super easy, monitor looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: MacBook PRO retina - GREAT MONITOR SOLUTION
customer_reviews.text: I viewed several monitors in stores and online and found this unit to meet my criteria -- Best size 27", Matte non-reflective (ceiling bulb fixture has no impact), weight less than 13 lbs (plan to travel with it-kept packing), great colors, setup - on my Apple MacBook PRO Retina ( plug in power, plug HDMI into unit -- turn it on) , GREAT PRICE TOO! VALUE, PERFORMANCE, and FLEXIBILITY... After months of use, I have found one small issue... My changes in Contrast and Brightness are often reset to factory settings making me change the setting too frequently. Otherwise, a perfect solution and I still rate it a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: R. Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Poor Controls and Only 1 HDMI
customer_reviews.text: Controls are quite cumbersome, and audio-out is only for the single HDMI out. I mainly use this for my PS4 and so far it has met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stancil

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this monitor, a lot of people were peeved because of the bezel claims but I like the monitor a lot....
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Farnum

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: No complaints in the first week of use. Great picture quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I knew I wanted a bigger monitor than what I currently had and did not want to sacrifice image quality. When I received this I was happy I chose this product. 1) It looks amazing. 2) 27 Inch is just fine, I was looking for 30+ but considering the prices for those monitors I was more than satisfied with this. 3) Cheap 4) Elegant look. I like the stand in particular Only con I'd say about it was that it doesnt come with an HDMI cable. Luckily I have a few just lying around.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Padron

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: I have already same monitor and I ordered second for my son. This monitor is great!
customer_reviews.author: Zhanna DeGrafft

customer_reviews.title: This Monitor is perfect. I do a lot of CAD work and ...
customer_reviews.text: This Monitor is perfect. I do a lot of CAD work and it is amazing, I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: STEWART LEADBITTER

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen
customer_reviews.text: Great screen, great price. Delivered on time, no issue. Easy to setup. Love the anti-glare matte look. It is not the Apple super duper $1000 screen type quality. But it is close and when you don't have 1 next to the other, you would not even notice. I like this screen. You should get it it you are looking for a budget 27 incher.
customer_reviews.author: Tone the bone

customer_reviews.title: I really like it but there is something really odd about the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am considering replacing the Lenovo. I really like it but there is something really odd about the monitor when I am playing youtube videos. Reason being is, the screen is go black when my computer is either adjusting to the hd quality on the quality of the youtube video. Is this normal? I think not. No monitor should go black and return to adjust to an hd video or not adjusting to a HD video. The monitor should be capable functioning on any quality video without going into black screen and returning back to its norm. This is the only issue I have and it become really annoying at times.
customer_reviews.author: adrian

customer_reviews.title: wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: I love it, wifre loves it. I wish it was a little more sensitive when pushing the power button. I have to hit it at least 3 times to get it.
customer_reviews.author: TechnoTim

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is very clear and easy on the eyes! It is excellent quality so far and I am using it right now.
customer_reviews.author: kira

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen
customer_reviews.text: I did a ton of research and finally decided to buy this gigantic Lenovo Monitor!! It just looks sick. Got it hooked up to my new mac mini 2013 and use Adobe CS6 and its really nice having a big enough screen for multiple windows. IPS screen for perfect color from all angles Stand is simple but very solid I highly recommend this 1080 LED IPS Lenovo 27" Monitor
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for low price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Wide -Stylish -Great stand -Low price Cons: Only one is power plug is kind of loose but as long as you don't shake your table, you will be fine
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Best. Monitor. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a year now, can't believe I haven't written a review before. It's one of those monitors that makes you say WOW when you see it. Buy it, try it, if you don't like it you're crazy, but then you can return it. You won't return it though. I want to see what their next newer version of this will bring. Would love to see a 32" model of this...
customer_reviews.author: Ben Bethel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, beats Samsung for sure
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a Samsung monitor for 1 year which costs more than $400. After I got this one, I have to say it is way better than my Samsung one. The setup is super easy and the image is crisp, the color is bright and real. With a price of $200, this is a perfect deal.
customer_reviews.author: ningxin sun

customer_reviews.title: Is this edgeless?  Not by my definition!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a little over $200 here on amazon. Just about the write price for a regular 27" monitor that is not edgeless. As many others posted, it is no where near edgeless. I've gone under my graphic's card settings and scaled it to 100% vertical and horizontal and still no luck. I looked at the screen under very good lighting and found that the black 2/5 inches from both the left and right edges are not pixels and is colored very well to blend in with the pixel screen.
customer_reviews.author: gamer4life

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I don't know much about monitors but I read the reviews and decided on this one. The person I bought this for was very impressed, and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: dianna tutrone

customer_reviews.title: Liking this large monitor!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave this monitor 4 stars instead of 5 is because it does not have built-in speakers. This is no big deal, but I would have liked to known this before ... had to purchase speakers (my old monitor had them built-in.) Overall, this is a very good monitor ... crisp, clear visual and setup was a snap. I'm very pleased with this monitor so far.
customer_reviews.author: HerRoyalHighness

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: this one is bad.... its over fps so hard..and have very big flash...dont buy it ..waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: peifeng zhao

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and price...
customer_reviews.text: Just received my monitor and I have to say that it was a breeze to hook up. I haven't even begun to tap into it's "super powers" yet, but the picture is really amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Risse Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo Support is Poor for end users.
customer_reviews.text: I will not buy another Lenovo product. Device arrived with a dead pixel was told it would take up to six weeks to get repaired. I wanted a RMA. I would of even given my CC number. But no joy. Will be returning to Amazon for a full refund and buying another product. The product was good over all but will not do business with someone who provides poor support.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: It is very wide, easy on my eyes, easy to change setup. I bought it for 299 when I am back to leave a review becomes 349 I guess I am lucky on my timing too.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: The Monitor exceeds my expectation at this price point
customer_reviews.text: It was truly plug and play - no set-up required. Using it with a macbook pro and mission control with 5 different windows. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Bill186

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just like the other review I've seen, the picture doesn't go completely to the edge, but it doesn't hinder the use of the monitor at all.
customer_reviews.author: Caity

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor, nothing special....
customer_reviews.text: It works well and has a nice picture. Nothing magnificent about it. Have it VESA mounted without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: Lenovo LI2721sW 27-Inch LED-Lit Monitor
product_meta.description:
The Lenovo LI2721sW monitor. The worlds first edgeless 27" IPS Display. The super slim and stylish Lenovo LI2721sW allows edge viewing. Its fully functional 27"screen with IPS technology offers unparalleled visual quality front any angle. And the durable grade A+ glass and non reflective screen ensure perfect clarity.

AMAZON.COM


OVERVIEW

THE LENOVO LI2721SW DISPLAY: IPS TECHNOLOGY ALLOWS VIEWING FROM ANY ANGLE.
The super slim and stylish Lenovo LI2721sW maximizes the viewing surface with an ultra-slim bezel. Its 27” Full HD screen with 1920 x 1080 resolution, IPS technology and anti-glare coating provide an ultra sharp picture in any environment and at any viewing angle. VESA standard wall mount compatibility (mount not included) provides additional versatility.




AT A GLANCE:

 * 1920x1080 Resolution @60Hz
 * IPS LED Panel
 * 250 cd/m2 brightness
 * 14ms response time
 * Dynamic Contrast Ratio of 10M:1
 * Typical Contrast Ratio of 1000:1
 * 178/178 viewing angle
 * VGA+DVI+HDMI input signals
 * Audio out
 * 100x100 mm vesa mountable
 * 1.67" x 17.5" x 24.6" (D x H x W)
 * 5.80Kg/ 12.79lb
 * Smart metal stand
 * Magic touch controls
 * Adjust screen +5 through -20 degrees
 * IPS perfect picture viewing angle 3.5x wider than standard LED monitors
 * Grade A+ glass
 * Non-reflective screen
feature_bullets: Stylish design maximizes viewing surface with an ultra-slim bezel
True Ultra-Slim with smart metal stand
IPS Perfect picture viewing angle 3.5x wider than standard LED monitors

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars62 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
